Fast C Backend¶

C backend that computes the energies, magnetic susceptibilities, and heat capacities faster than Python could ever wish.

ising.fastc.plot_vals(positions, coupling, magnet, temps, boltzmann, threads)¶

Calculate the values to plot.

Parameters

  • positions (int) – The number of slots in the Ising model.

  • coupling (float) – The coupling constant to use.

  • magnet (float) – The magnetic constant to use.

  • temps (list(float)) – A list of temperature points for the plots.

  • boltzmann (float) – The Bolzmann constant.

  • threads (int) – The number of threads to use.

Return tuple(list(float), list(float), list(float)

Three lists, the first being the energies, the second the heat capacities, and the third the magnetic susceptibilities.

Canonical

ising/src/fastcmodule.c:fastc_pass_to_c

PyMODINIT_FUNC PyInit_fastc(void)¶

Makes the module work.
